course_description: This course adheres to software vulnerabilities and hacking at technical and broader societal levels, taking a deep technical exploration into hands-on binary exploitation.
prerequisites: CS 450 & CS 551 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1897, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: Y. Vigfusson, Status: Open
